webscript.description:
Update the details of a Web site.
The following properties may be updated.
<dl> <dt>title</dt><dd>the title of the web site</dd> <dt>description</dt><dd>the description for the web site</dd> <dt>visibility</dt><dd>the site visibility, one of (PUBLIC,MODERATED,PRIVATE)</dd> <dt>type</dt><dd>the UCM site type, one of (All, Classic, Modern, etc.)</dd> <dt>address</dt><dd>the UCM site address</dd> <dt>email</dt><dd>the UCM site email</dd> <dt>phone</dt><dd>the UCM site phone</dd> <dt>fax</dt><dd>the UCM site fax</dd> </dl>
